text:
Hi everyone, I’m Jeremiah :)

Thrilled to be here. Here are a few things to know about me:

:point_right::skin-tone-4: I’m a B2B and SaaS content marketer. In simple English, I help SaaS and B2B companies translate bland, technical writing into engaging and high-converting copy. 

:point_right::skin-tone-4: I’m a hybrid content professional. I work in both freelance and in-house capacities. My most recent role was at Wonsulting, where I served as the SEO & Content Manager. 

:point_right::skin-tone-4:  I love Beyoncé, great conversations, and Netflix. I also think SEMRush is the king of SaaS Content Marketing. :eyes:

I look forward to building amazing connections with y’all!

elements.text: Hi everyone, I’m Jeremiah :)

I’m a B2B and SaaS content marketer. In simple English, I help SaaS and B2B companies translate bland, technical writing into engaging and high-converting copy.
I’m a hybrid content professional. I work in both freelance and in-house capacities. My most recent role was at Wonsulting, where I served as the SEO & Content Manager.
I love Beyoncé, great conversations, and Netflix. I also think SEMRush is the king of SaaS Content Marketing.
I look forward to building amazing connections with y’all!

Hi everyone, this is Akshay and I work in the Financial Services space currently. Currently projects include building on a Social Media strategy. Hoping to learn and e-meet you all. 

In the past I've worked with early stage startups - feel free to drop me a line if I can be of help

text:
Hi everyone! I’m Luka :flag-rs: and I obsess over everything SEO & Content related for tech companies. :technologist:

I work primarily in-house as a content/SEO lead but hope to open up an agency in the future. :slightly_smiling_face:

I’d love to connect with all of you who are far more experienced and happy to share your knowledge. I’m open to collaborations, requests, or a fun chat!  :tada:

Cheers!

elements.text: Hi everyone! I’m Luka
and I obsess over everything SEO & Content related for tech companies.
I work primarily in-house as a content/SEO lead but hope to open up an agency in the future.
I’d love to connect with all of you who are far more experienced and happy to share your knowledge. I’m open to collaborations, requests, or a fun chat!
Cheers!
Welcome, Luka!

text:
Hello folks,
I am Prashant Lakhotia from Bangalore, India.
It is amazing to join this community. Looking forward to connecting/interacting with you all, virtually.

Brief about me:
I am a digital marketer(B2C) with 5 years of experience in social media marketing, SEO, performance marketing, product marketing, and content marketing. All of my projects and companies have been within India. Currently, I am looking for full-time/part-time/freelance projects.

Please feel free to reach out to me if I can help anywhere or if you know of any opportunity where my skillset can be utilised or just over a virtual coffee to network.

LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/prashantlakhotia/>

text: Hi all, it's Onur from Turkey. I am co-founder of a start-up, which is actively running in L&D vertical. Thanks to this product (Rootie), we found a chance to work with training managers in over 40 enterprises and to contact 40.000 learners. Our observations in the corporate learning market light up an idea for storytellers, content creators, and independent instructors for their marketing activities, like lead generation. Our new product is <http://minicoursegenerator.com|minicoursegenerator.com> and hope that I can get this community's priceless insights and feedback in the following time. Hope to talk to you, best to all :wave:

text:
Whatsup y'all,
I'm Alessandro, a co-founder @ Pallet. We do recruitment software. I run the marketing team right now and we're in the process of investing pretty heavily into content marketing. Excited to meet people and gain insights!

text: Hey everyone, I'm Komal, a freelance writer for B2B SaaS brands in the sales, marketing and eCommerce industries. You can always find me with a cold coffee in hand, reading or watching something or the other about content marketing. Super excited to be a part of the community, and learn and be a part of convos!:raised_hands:

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?

Hey everyone! I’m Kelly, I am a marketing director for Infocyte (joined the company ~2 months ago), and we’re a cybersecurity SaaS company. I work from home in Colorado, USA :mountain:

I’ve spent a lot of time working for agencies in my career too, but now I am kind of the lone point of contact for all things marketing - including website, design, etc etc. I’m excited to join the community and surround myself with other marketers. I’m hoping to stay up-to-date with what’s going on in the industry and keep my skills and knowledge sharp! :nerd_face:

text:
:dancer: Hey everyone! My name is Krissi. I’m a freelance B2B and B2C content writer. I’m currently based in South Korea and have lived here since 2013. I run my biz part-time and teach English as a day job to keep a visa here.

In November, I’m relaunching my signature course to help self-motivated women build their own successful freelance writing businesses so they can create a life they love. Super glad to be here! Thanks for the invite, <@UJG9WTEKG>!
